form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION TO FILE PETITION FOR NATURALIZATION, N-400 ( (Rev. 10-1-85Y)

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/18/2023 NMKF UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE OMB NO. 1115-0009 IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE Approval Expires 10-87 FEE STAMP APPLICATION TO FILE PETITION FOR NATURALIZATION Mail or take to: DEC 12 3.47 PM 86 IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE SFR ALIEN REGISTRATION (See INSTRUCTIONS. BE SURE YOU UNDERSTAND EACH (Show the exact spelling of your name as it appears on your alien registration QUESTION BEFORE YOU ANSWER IT. PLEASE PRINT OR receipt card, and the number of your card. If you did not register, so state.) TYPE.) Name CHU, WAI MAN 316(a Q No. A12-994-632 Section of Law Date: 12-04-86 (Leave Blank) (1) My full true and correct name is CHU, WAI MAN (Full true name without abbreviations) (2) I now live at 3379 DESCANSO DR (Number and street, ) LOS ANGELES, CA 90026 (City county, state, zip code) (3) I was born on 05-27-14 in CANTON CHINA (Month) (Day) (Year) (City or town County, province, or state) (Country) (4) I request that my name be changed to (5) Other names I have used are: NONE (Include maiden name) Sex: X Male Female (6) Was your father or mother ever a United States citizen? Yes No (If "Yes", explain fully) (7) Can you read and write English? Yes No (8) Can you speak English? Yes No (9) Can you sign your name in English? Yes No (10) My lawful admission for permanent residence was on 01 66 under the name of CHU, WAI MAN (Month) at SAN FRANCISC(Year) CALIFORNIA (City) (State) (11) (a) I have resided continuously in the United States since 05 06 63 (Month) (Day) (Year) (b) I have resided continuously in the State of CALIFORNIA since 06 01 71 (Month) (Day) (c) During the last five years I have been physically in the United States for a total of 57 "60 (Year) months. (12) Do you intend to reside permanently in the United States? Yes No If "No," explain: & (13) In what places in the United States have you lived during the last 5 years? List present address FIRST. FROM To STREET ADDRESS CITY AND STATE (a) 06 19.71 PRESENT TIME 3379 DESCANSO DR LOS ANGELES, CA (b) 19 (c) 19 19 ,NO others 19 19 (d) (14) (a) Have you been out of the United States since your lawful admission as a permanent resident? Yes No If "Yes" fill in the following information for every absence of less than 6 months, no matter how short it was. DATE DEPARTED NAME OF SHIP, OR OF AIRLINE, RAILROAD COMPANY, BUS DATE RETURNED COMPANY, OR OTHER MEANS USED TO RETURN TO THE PLACE OR PORT OF ENTRY THROUGH WHICH You UNITED STATES RETURNED TO THE UNITED STATES 03-1982 04-1982 CHINA AIRLINES LOS ANGELES AIRPORT 03-1981 03-1980 84-1980 8H-1981 CHINA AIRLINES LOS ANGELES AIRPORT CHINA AIRLINES LOS ANGELES AIRPORT (b) Since your lawful admission, have you been out of the United States for a period of 6 months or longer? Yes No If "No", state "None"; If "Yes", fill in following information for every absence of /more than 6 months. DATE DEPARTED NAME OF SHIP OR OF AIRLINE, RAILROAD COMPANY, Bus DATE RETURNED COMPANY, OR OTHER MEANS USED TO RETURN TO THE PLACE OR PORT OF ENTRY THROUGH WHICH You UNITED STATES RETURNED TO THE UNITED STATES NONE none Form N-400 (Rev. 10-1-85)Y (OVER) (1)
